formattedAddress: 134 W 83rd St c9, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 134 W 83rd St c9, New York, NY 10024-5259, USA

originalText.text:
Petron Intercom & Camera has been nothing short of fantastic.  Peter, my main point of contact, was very professional; he provided lots of information about alarm systems in general (as I was deciding between several companies) and was great not only at setting up my alarm system and patiently teaching me about it, but incidentally helping me come to a decision on which security cameras to install (I was amazed by today‚Äôs technology).
Additionally, Peter provided his cell phone number in case there are ever any issues with the alarm system in the future (luckily, I have had no issues to date).  It's rare that you find this level of customer service these days, as I've had a couple of not-so-great experiences with contractors in Fort Lee since we moved.

originalText.text:
I've been meaning to leave a review about Petron Intercom & Camera Experts‚Äô service for a while now.
Paul is hands down the BEST! I called him out when I decided I wanted to actually have my alarm system monitored. I already had a system from a previous installer that stopped servicing The Bronx area, so I figured it'd be a little messy or pricey to get set up with a new company. Nope!  :)!! Paul never pressured me into buying a new system and he actually was able to set it up the day he came out! I've called him a few times in the past year re: recommendations on various cameras, Ring Doorbells, etc. Paul always took the time to answer all my questions and concerns without rushing me off the phone or making me feel I am wasting his time. He's very patient, knowledgeable and genuine. I would without a doubt highly recommend Petron to everyone.

originalText.text: The Petron Intercom & Camera Team ROCKS! Peter patiently and thoroughly answered all my questions. Peter, was very profession and knowledgeable. We requested installation to be completed before our trip out of Upper West and Petron Intercom & Camera came through all the way! Customer Service (as well as Security Systems) is this company's specialty! We highly recommend Petron Intercom & Camera to everyone! Thank you Peter!

originalText.text:
No BS with the guys from Petron. They do things right or they refuse to even try. I liked their approach and had a strong feeling that this is the company to go with.
I have waited a month to make sure all is good before writing my review, and now I can tell you: 5 stars job done.
Professionals!! üôè
